Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about the <font face="courier new">DataGrid</font> and <font face="courier new">DataGridView</font> controls are true and which are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">DataGridView</font> control allows you to specify custom column types.
The <font face="courier new">DataGrid</font> control displays data only from an external data source.
The <font face="courier new">DataGridView</font> control allows you to set the same appearance for the cells having similar kind of data.
The <font face="courier new">DataGrid</font> control allows you to set shortcut menus for cells.
The <font face="courier new">DataGridView</font> control allows you to display hierarchical information of two tables.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that’s incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(True), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(False).
